Here are some Strategies For Handling Customer Complaints About Defective Products:

1 Listening Actively: 
Listening actively to what customers say about your product defect,  Pay close attention To Their concern Avoid interrupting and maintain empathetic communication Active listening encourages the customer to explain their problem helping in understanding The exact root Cause 

2 Acknowledge & Apologize:
Acknowledge customer frustration And Apologize for any inconvenience caused This approach displays empathy and recognition of customer dissatisfaction An acknowledgment and apology can reduce Tension Creating a space for constructive conversation.

3 Gather Information:
Gather details From Customers About Product defect Collect specific information like product batch date product serial number purchase time or order number Details help to Identify the underlying reason and facilitate prompt solution It is essential to gather complete accurate Data 

4 Offer Solution Or Alternative: 
Work with the customer To Discover possible Solutions Offer Refund repairs exchange or Replacement depending on case particulars Provide detailed information On resolution Procedures Ensure Customer understands each step 

5 Resolve Problem Promptly:
Handle customer Concern Promptly Implement agreed Upon solutions Do Not Delay Providing swift resolutions Reflect positively On business brand values Timely resolutions instill faith

6 Communicate Effectively:
Communicate Proactively With The Customer During and after solving the problem Updates inform customer about progress Keep Them Informed Until Resolution Builds confidence and Demonstrates interest In delivering Satisfaction.
